20 enum DepthFormat {
21  DepthInteger,
22  DepthFloat,
23  DepthRGBA,
24 };
25 
27 template<int Precision, int BitsPerPixel, int ScaleBits=0>
28 struct DepthQuantizeBits {
29  enum {
30  precision = Precision,
31 
32  edge = 4, // only 4 works
33  scale_bits = ScaleBits,
34  bits_per_pixel = BitsPerPixel,
35  num_bytes = (BitsPerPixel*edge*edge)/8
36  };
37 
38  uint8_t bits[num_bytes];
39 };
40 
41 typedef DepthQuantizeBits<16, 4, 0> DepthQuantizeBits16;
42 typedef DepthQuantizeBits<24, 3, 4> DepthQuantizeBits24;
43 
45 template<int Precision>
46 struct DepthQuantizeMinMaxDepth {
47  uint8_t depth[2][Precision/8];
48 };
49 
50 typedef DepthQuantizeMinMaxDepth<16> MinMaxDepth16;
51 typedef DepthQuantizeMinMaxDepth<24> MinMaxDepth24;
52 
54 template<int Precision, int BitsPerPixel, int ScaleBits=0>
55 struct DepthQuantize: public DepthQuantizeBits<Precision, BitsPerPixel, ScaleBits> {
56 
57  uint8_t depth[2][Precision/8];
58 };
59 
60 typedef DepthQuantize<16, 4, 0> DepthQuantize16;
61 typedef DepthQuantize<24, 3, 4> DepthQuantize24;
62 
64 template<class DepthQuantize>
65 #ifdef __CUDACC__
66 __device__ __host__
67 #endif
68 inline void setdepth(DepthQuantize &q, int idx, uint32_t value) {
69  for (unsigned i=3; i>0; --i) {
70  if (i <= sizeof(q.depth[idx]))
71  q.depth[idx][i-1] = value & 0xff;
72  value >>= 8;
73  }
74 }
75 
77 template<class DepthQuantize>
78 #ifdef __CUDACC__
79 __device__ __host__
80 #endif
81 uint32_t getdepth(const DepthQuantize &q, int idx);
82 
84 template<class DepthQuantize>
85 #ifdef __CUDACC__
86 __device__ __host__
87 #endif
88 void dq_clearbits(DepthQuantize &q) {
89  for (unsigned i=0; i<sizeof(q.bits); ++i) {
90  q.bits[i] = 0;
91  }
92 }
93 
95 template<class DepthQuantize>
96 #ifdef __CUDACC__
97 __device__ __host__
98 #endif
99 inline void dq_setbit(DepthQuantize &q, int bit, unsigned value=1) {
100  q.bits[bit>>3] |= (value & 1)<<(bit&7);
101 }
102 
104 template<class DepthQuantize>
105 #ifdef __CUDACC__
106 __device__ __host__
107 #endif
108 void dq_clearbit(DepthQuantize &q, int bit) {
109  q.bits[bit>>3] &= ~(1<<(bit&7));
110 }
111 
113 template<class DepthQuantize>
114 #ifdef __CUDACC__
115 __device__ __host__
116 #endif
117 inline unsigned dq_getbit(const DepthQuantize &q, int bit) {
118  return (q.bits[bit>>3]>>(bit&7)) & 1;
119 }
120 
122 template<class DepthQuantize>
123 #ifdef __CUDACC__
124 __device__ __host__
125 #endif
126 inline void dq_setbits(DepthQuantize &q, int bit, int nbits, unsigned value, int block=1) {
127 #if 0
128  for (int i=bit; i<bit+nbits; ++i) {
129  dq_setbit(q, i, value&1);
130  value >>= 1;
131  }
132 #else
133  const uint32_t mask = (1<<block)-1;
134  for (int i=bit+nbits-1; i>=bit; i-=block) {
135  q.bits[i>>3] |= (value & mask)<<(i&7);
136  value >>= block;
137  }
138 #endif
139 }
140 
142 template<class DepthQuantize>
143 #ifdef __CUDACC__
144 __device__ __host__
145 #endif
146 inline void dq_setbits(DepthQuantize &q, uint64_t bits) {
147  for (int i=0; i<DepthQuantize::num_bytes; ++i) {
148  //for (int i = DepthQuantize::num_bytes; i>=0; --i) {
149  q.bits[i] = bits & 0xff;
150  bits >>= 8;
151  }
152 }
153 
155 template<class DepthQuantize>
156 #ifdef __CUDACC__
157 __device__ __host__
158 #endif
159 inline unsigned dq_getbits(const DepthQuantize &q, int bit, int nbits) {
160  unsigned v = 0;
161  for (int i=bit+nbits-1; i>=bit; --i) {
162  v <<= 1;
163  v |= dq_getbit(q, i);
164  }
165  return v;
166 }
167 
169 template<class DepthQuantize>
170 #ifdef __CUDACC__
171 __device__ __host__
172 #endif
173 inline uint64_t dq_getbits(const DepthQuantize &q) {
174  uint64_t bits = q.bits[DepthQuantize::num_bytes-1];
175  for (int i=DepthQuantize::num_bytes-2; i>=0; --i) {
176  bits <<= 8;
177  bits |= q.bits[i];
178  }
179  return bits;
180 }

182 template<DepthFormat format, int bpp>
183 #ifdef __CUDACC__
184 __device__ __host__
185 #endif
186 inline uint32_t get_depth(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h);
187 
188 template<>
189 #ifdef __CUDACC__
190 __device__ __host__
191 #endif
192 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthFloat, 4>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
193 
194  const float df = ((float *)img)[y*w+x];
195  uint32_t di = df * 0x00ffffffU;
196  if (di > 0x00ffffffU)
197  di = 0x00ffffffU;
198  return di;
199 }
200 
201 template<>
202 #ifdef __CUDACC__
203 __device__ __host__
204 #endif
205 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthRGBA, 4>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
206 
207  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*4];
208  return ((dp[2]*256 + dp[1])*256 + dp[0]);
209 }
210 
211 template<>
212 #ifdef __CUDACC__
213 __device__ __host__
214 #endif
215 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 1>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
216 
217  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*1];
218  return *dp * 0x0010101U;
219 }
220 
221 template<>
222 #ifdef __CUDACC__
223 __device__ __host__
224 #endif
225 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 2>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
226 
227  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*2];
228  return (dp[1]*256 + dp[0])*256 + dp[1];
229 }
230 
231 template<>
232 #ifdef __CUDACC__
233 __device__ __host__
234 #endif
235 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 3>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
236 
237  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*3];
238  return ((dp[3]*256 + dp[2])*256 + dp[1]);
239 }
240 
241 template<>
242 #ifdef __CUDACC__
243 __device__ __host__
244 #endif
245 inline uint32_t get_depth<DepthInteger, 4>(const unsigned char *img, int x, int y, int w, int h) {
246 
247  const unsigned char *dp = &img[(y*w+x)*4];
248  return ((dp[3]*256 + dp[2])*256 + dp[1]);
249 }
